1507  class XeniumErrorCategory_
1508  : public std::error_category
1509  {
1510  public:
1517  constexpr XeniumErrorCategory_() noexcept
1518  {
1519  }
1520 
1526  const char* name() const noexcept override
1527  {
1528  return "zakero.Xenium";
1529  }
1530 
1537  std::string message(int condition
1538  ) const noexcept override
1539  {
1540  switch(condition)
1541  {
1542 #define X(name_, val_, mesg_) \
1543  case val_: return mesg_;
1544  ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR_DATA
1545 #undef X
1546  }
1547 
1548  return "Unknown error condition";
1549  }
1550  } XeniumErrorCategory;

1586  std::error_code convertConnectionError(int xcb_error_code
1587  ) noexcept
1588  {
1589  switch(xcb_error_code)
1590  {
1591  case 0:
1592  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_None);
1593 
1594  case XCB_CONN_ERROR:
1595  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Connection_Failed);
1596 
1597  case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_EXT_NOTSUPPORTED:
1598  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Extension_Not_Supported);
1599 
1600  case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_MEM_INSUFFICIENT:
1601  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Not_Enough_Memory);
1602 
1603  case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_REQ_LEN_EXCEED:
1604  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Request_Too_Long);
1605 
1606  case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_PARSE_ERR:
1607  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Invalid_Display_Name);
1608 
1609  case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_INVALID_SCREEN:
1610  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Invalid_Screen);
1611 
1612  default:
1613  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Unknown);
1614  }
1615  }

1617 
1630  template<class Type
1631  >
1632  std::error_code validateMinMax(const Type& min
1633  , const Type& max
1634  ) noexcept
1635  {
1636  if((min.width < 0)
1637  || (min.height < 0)
1638  || (max.width < 0)
1639  || (max.height < 0)
1640  )
1641  {
1642  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
1643  }
1644 
1645  if((max.width > 0)
1646  && (min.width > max.width)
1647  )
1648  {
1649  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Minimum_Size_Greater_Than_Maximum_Size);
1650  }
1651 
1652  if((max.height > 0)
1653  && (min.height > max.height)
1654  )
1655  {
1656  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Minimum_Size_Greater_Than_Maximum_Size);
1657  }
1658 
1659  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_None);
1660  };
1661 }

2433 
2459 Xenium* Xenium::connect(const std::string& display
2460  , std::error_code& error
2461  ) noexcept
2462 {
2463  const char* display_name = nullptr;
2464 
2465  if(display.empty() == false)
2466  {
2467  display_name = display.c_str();
2468  }
2469 
2470  // --- Connect To X11 Server --- //
2471  int screen_number = 0;
2472  xcb_connection_t* connection = xcb_connect(display_name, &screen_number);
2473  int xcb_error = xcb_connection_has_error(connection);
2474  if(xcb_error)
2475  {
2476  error = convertConnectionError(xcb_error);
2477 
2478  return nullptr;
2479  }
2480 
2481  // --- Xenium --- //
2482  Xenium* xenium = new Xenium();
2483 
2484  error = xenium->init(connection, screen_number);
2485  if(error)
2486  {
2487  delete xenium;
2488 
2489  return nullptr;
2490  }
2491 
2492  xenium->eventLoopStart();
2493 
2494  error = xenium->atomInit();
2495  if(error)
2496  {
2497  delete xenium;
2498 
2499  return nullptr;
2500  }
2501 
2502  error = ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
2503 
2504  return xenium;
2505 }

2518

2520  {
2521  xcb_disconnect(this->connection);
2522  connection = nullptr;
2523  }
2524 
2525  return;
2526 }

2530 
2536 std::error_code Xenium::init(xcb_connection_t* connection
2537  , int screen_number
2538  ) noexcept
2539 {
2540  this->connection = connection;
2541 
2542  // --- X11 Server Setup Information --- //
2543  this->setup = xcb_get_setup(this->connection);
2544  ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_VAR(to_string(*setup));
2545 
2546  // --- Find the current screen --- //
2547  xcb_screen_iterator_t screen_iterator = xcb_setup_roots_iterator(this->setup);
2548 
2549  for(int i = 0; i < screen_number; i++)
2550  {
2551  xcb_screen_next(&screen_iterator);
2552  }
2553 
2554  this->screen = screen_iterator.data;
2555  ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_VAR(to_string(*screen));
2556 
2557  // --- XXB Extension --- //
2558  std::error_code error;
2559 
2560  error = xkbInit();
2561  if(error)
2562  {
2563  return error;
2564  }
2565 
2566  // --- Initialize The Internals --- //
2567  error = randrInit();
2568  if(error)
2569  {
2570  return error;
2571  }
2572 
2573  error = outputInit();
2574  if(error)
2575  {
2576  return error;
2577  }
2578 
2579  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
2580 }

2619 
2627 void Xenium::eventLoop(std::stop_token thread_token
2628  , Xenium* xenium
2629  ) noexcept
2630 {
2631  const int Randr_Notify_Event = xenium->randr_event_base + XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY;
2632 
2633  xcb_generic_event_t* event = nullptr;
2634 
2635  xenium->event_loop_is_running.store(true);
2636 
2637  // Handle events and render window contents
2638  while(thread_token.stop_requested() == false)
2639  {
2640  // Process all events
2641  while(true)
2642  {
2643  event = xcb_poll_for_event(xenium->connection);
2644 
2645  if(event == nullptr)
2646  {
2647  /*
2648  * No more events from the server, check if
2649  * there any remaining key events to process.
2650  */
2651  xenium->keyDataArrayProcess();
2652 
2653  break;
2654  }
2655 
2656  switch(event->response_type & 0x7f)
2657  {
2658  case XCB_CLIENT_MESSAGE:
2659  xenium->xcbEvent(
2660  (xcb_client_message_event_t*)event
2661  );
2662  break;
2663 
2664  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_PRESS ------------ //
2665  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_RELEASE ---------- //
2666  case XCB_BUTTON_PRESS:
2667  [[fallthrough]];
2668  case XCB_BUTTON_RELEASE:
2669  xenium->xcbEvent(
2670  (xcb_button_press_event_t*)event
2671  );
2672  break;
2673 
2674  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_ENTER_WINDOW ------------ //
2675  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_LEAVE_WINDOW ------------ //
2676  case XCB_ENTER_NOTIFY: [[fallthrough]];
2677  case XCB_LEAVE_NOTIFY:
2678  xenium->xcbEvent(
2679  (xcb_enter_notify_event_t*)event
2680  );
2681  break;
2682 
2683  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_EXPOSURE ---------------- //
2684  case XCB_EXPOSE:
2685  xenium->xcbEvent(
2686  (xcb_expose_event_t*)event
2687  );
2688  break;
2689 
2690  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_FOCUS_CHANGE ------------ //
2691  case XCB_FOCUS_IN: [[fallthrough]];
2692  case XCB_FOCUS_OUT:
2693  xenium->xcbEvent(
2694  (xcb_focus_in_event_t*)event
2695  );
2696  break;
2697 
2698  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEY_PRESS --------------- //
2699  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEY_RELEASE ------------- //
2700  case XCB_KEY_PRESS: [[fallthrough]];
2701  case XCB_KEY_RELEASE:
2702  xenium->xcbEvent(
2703  (xcb_key_press_event_t*)event
2704  );
2705  break;
2706 
2707  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_POINTER_MOTION ---------- //
2708  case XCB_MOTION_NOTIFY:
2709  xenium->xcbEvent(
2710  (xcb_motion_notify_event_t*)event
2711  );
2712  break;
2713 
2714  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_PROPERTY_CHANGE --------- //
2715  case XCB_PROPERTY_NOTIFY:
2716  xenium->xcbEvent(
2717  (xcb_property_notify_event_t*)event
2718  );
2719  break;
2720 
2721  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_STRUCTURE_NOTIFY -------- //
2722  case XCB_CONFIGURE_NOTIFY:
2723  xenium->xcbEvent(
2724  (xcb_configure_notify_event_t*)event
2725  );
2726  break;
2727 
2728  case XCB_GRAVITY_NOTIFY:
2729  xenium->xcbEvent(
2730  (xcb_gravity_notify_event_t*)event
2731  );
2732  break;
2733 
2734  case XCB_MAP_NOTIFY:
2735  xenium->xcbEvent(
2736  (xcb_map_notify_event_t*)event
2737  );
2738  break;
2739 
2740  case XCB_REPARENT_NOTIFY:
2741  xenium->xcbEvent(
2742  (xcb_reparent_notify_event_t*)event
2743  );
2744  break;
2745 
2746  case XCB_UNMAP_NOTIFY:
2747  xenium->xcbEvent(
2748  (xcb_unmap_notify_event_t*)event
2749  );
2750  break;
2751 
2752  // --- Other Event Types ---------------------- //
2753  default:
2754  if(event->response_type == Randr_Notify_Event)
2755  {
2756  ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "RandR Event: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
2757  xenium->randrEvent(
2758  (xcb_randr_notify_event_t*)event
2759  );
2760  }
2761  else
2762  {
2763  ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Unknown Event: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
2764  }
2765 
2766  // --- ------------------------------------ --- //
2767  // --- Unused event masks at this time --- //
2768  // --- ------------------------------------ --- //
2769  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_1_MOTION --------- //
2770  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_2_MOTION --------- //
2771  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_3_MOTION --------- //
2772  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_4_MOTION --------- //
2773  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_5_MOTION --------- //
2774  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_MOTION ----------- //
2775  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_COLOR_MAP_CHANGE -------- //
2776  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEYMAP_STATE ------------ //
2777  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_OWNER_GRAB_BUTTON ------- //
2778  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_POINTER_MOTION_HINT ----- //
2779  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_RESIZE_REDIRECT --------- //
2780  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY ----- //
2781  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT --- //
2782  // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_VISIBILITY_CHANGE ------- //
2783  }
2784 
2785  free(event);
2786  }
2787 
2788  /*
2789  * All events are done, check if there are any windows to
2790  * create or destory.
2791  */
2792  xenium->xenium_window_mutex.lock();
2793  {
2794  for(Xenium::WindowCreateData* window_data : xenium->window_to_create)
2795  {
2796  xenium->xcbWindowCreate(window_data);
2797  window_data->barrier.set_value();
2798  }
2799 
2800  xenium->window_to_create.clear();
2801 
2802  for(Xenium::WindowDestroyData* window_data : xenium->window_to_destroy)
2803  {
2804  xenium->xcbWindowDestroy(window_data);
2805  window_data->barrier.set_value();
2806  }
2807 
2808  xenium->window_to_destroy.clear();
2809  }
2810  xenium->xenium_window_mutex.unlock();
2811 
2812  std::this_thread::yield();
2813  }
2814 
2815  xenium->event_loop_is_running.store(false);
2816 }
2817

3251 const Xenium::Output& Xenium::output(const int16_t x
3252  , const int16_t y
3253  , OutputId& output_id
3254  ) noexcept
3255 {
3256  for(const auto& iter : output_map)
3257  {
3258  const Output& output = iter.second;
3259 
3260  if(x >= output.x
3261  && x < (output.x + output.width)
3262  && y >= output.y
3263  && y < (output.y + output.height)
3264  )
3265  {
3266  output_id = iter.first;
3267 
3268  return output;
3269  }
3270  }
3271 
3272  uint64_t distance = std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::max();
3273 
3274  for(const auto& iter : output_map)
3275  {
3276  const Output& output = iter.second;
3277 
3278  int64_t output_x = (std::abs(output.x) + output.width) / 2;
3279  int64_t output_y = (std::abs(output.y) + output.height) / 2;
3280 
3281  uint64_t dist = std::abs(x - output_x) + std::abs(y - output_y);
3282 
3283  if(dist < distance)
3284  {
3285  output_id = iter.first;
3286  }
3287  }
3288 
3289  return output_map[output_id];
3290 }

4000 
4010 std::error_code Xenium::windowModeSet(const Xenium::WindowId window_id
4011  , const Xenium::WindowMode current_mode
4012  , const Xenium::WindowMode new_mode
4013  ) noexcept
4014 {
4015  xcb_client_message_event_t event =
4016  { .response_type = XCB_CLIENT_MESSAGE
4017  , .format = 32
4018  , .sequence = 0
4019  , .window = window_id
4020  , .type = atom_net_wm_state
4021  , .data = { }
4022  };
4023 
4024  if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Normal)
4025  {
4026  // Do nothing
4027  }
4028  else
4029  {
4030  event.data.data32[0] = _NET_WM_STATE_REMOVE;
4031 
4032  if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Fullscreen)
4033  {
4034  event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen;
4035  event.data.data32[2] = 0;
4036  }
4037  else // if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Maximized)
4038  {
4039  event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz;
4040  event.data.data32[2] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert;
4041  }
4042 
4043  xcb_send_event(this->connection
4044  , 0 // do not propagate
4045  , this->screen->root
4046  , XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT | XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY
4047  , (const char*)&event
4048  );
4049  }
4050 
4051  if(new_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Normal)
4052  {
4053  // Do nothing
4054  }
4055  else
4056  {
4057  event.data.data32[0] = _NET_WM_STATE_ADD;
4058 
4059  if(new_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Fullscreen)
4060  {
4061  event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen;
4062  event.data.data32[2] = 0;
4063  }
4064  else // if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Maximized)
4065  {
4066  event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz;
4067  event.data.data32[2] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert;
4068  }
4069 
4070  xcb_send_event(this->connection
4071  , 0 // do not propagate
4072  , this->screen->root
4073  , XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT | XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY
4074  , (const char*)&event
4075  );
4076  }
4077 
4078  xcb_flush(this->connection);
4079 
4080  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
4081 }

4204 void Xenium::windowResizeTo(const Output& output
4205  , Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size
4206  , const xcb_configure_notify_event_t* event
4207  ) noexcept
4208 {
4209  bool update_size = false;
4210 
4211  if(window_size.unit == SizeUnit::Millimeter)
4212  {
4213  auto pixel = convertMmToPixel(output
4214  , window_size.mm.width
4215  , window_size.mm.height
4216  );
4217 
4218  if(pixel.first != window_size.pixel.width
4219  || pixel.second != window_size.pixel.height
4220  )
4221  {
4222  update_size = true;
4223  }
4224 
4225  window_size.pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4226 
4227  auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4228  , window_size.pixel.width
4229  , window_size.pixel.height
4230  );
4231  window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4232  }
4233  else if(window_size.unit == SizeUnit::Percent)
4234  {
4235  auto pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
4236  , window_size.percent.width
4237  , window_size.percent.height
4238  );
4239 
4240  if(pixel.first != window_size.pixel.width
4241  || pixel.second != window_size.pixel.height
4242  )
4243  {
4244  update_size = true;
4245  window_size.pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4246  }
4247 
4248  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4249  , window_size.pixel.width
4250  , window_size.pixel.height
4251  );
4252 
4253  window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4254  }
4255  else
4256  {
4257  if(event->width != window_size.pixel.width
4258  || event->height != window_size.pixel.height
4259  )
4260  {
4261  update_size = true;
4262  }
4263 
4264  window_size.pixel = {event->width, event->height};
4265 
4266  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4267  , window_size.pixel.width
4268  , window_size.pixel.height
4269  );
4270  window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4271 
4272  auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4273  , window_size.pixel.width
4274  , window_size.pixel.height
4275  );
4276  window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4277  }
4278 
4279  windowSizeSetMinMax(output, event->window, window_size);
4280 
4281  if(update_size)
4282  {
4283  window_size.pixel_lambda(window_size.pixel);
4284  window_size.percent_lambda(window_size.percent);
4285  window_size.mm_lambda(window_size.mm);
4286

4408  );

4548 void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_button_press_event_t* event
4549  ) noexcept
4550 {
4551 //std::cout << "Button Press: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4552 
4553  const WindowId window_id = event->event;
4554 
4555  uint32_t button_code = event->detail;
4556 
4557  if(button_code <= 3 || button_code >= 8)
4558  {
4559  if(button_code > 9)
4560  {
4561  button_code = 0;
4562  }
4563  else if(button_code >= 8)
4564  {
4565  button_code -= 5;
4566  }
4567  else
4568  {
4569  button_code--;
4570  }
4571 
4572  PointerButton button =
4573  { .code = Pointer_Button_Event_Code[button_code]
4574  , .state = event->response_type == XCB_BUTTON_PRESS
4575  ? Xenium::PointerButtonState::Pressed
4576  : Xenium::PointerButtonState::Released
4577  };
4578 
4579  OutputId output_id = window_output_map[window_id];
4580  Output output = output_map.at(output_id);
4581 
4582  PointPixel point_pixel = {0, event->event_x, event->event_y};
4583 
4584  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4585  , event->event_x
4586  , event->event_y
4587  );
4588  PointMm point_mm = {0, mm.first, mm.second};
4589 
4590  Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = window_size_map[window_id];
4591  PointPercent point_percent =
4592  { event->time
4593  , (float)event->event_x / (float)window_size.pixel.width
4594  , (float)event->event_y / (float)window_size.pixel.height
4595  };
4596 
4597  window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_mm(button, point_mm, key_modifier);
4598  window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_percent(button, point_percent, key_modifier);
4599  window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_pixel(button, point_pixel, key_modifier);
4600  }
4601  else if(event->response_type == XCB_BUTTON_PRESS)
4602  {
4603  if(button_code == 4 || button_code == 5)
4604  {
4605  PointerAxis pointer_axis =
4606  { .time = event->time
4607  , .steps = button_code == 4 ? -1 : 1
4608  , .distance = button_code == 4 ? -15.0f : 15.0f
4609  , .source = PointerAxisSource::Wheel
4610  , .type = PointerAxisType::Vertical
4611  };
4612 
4613  window_on_axis_map[window_id](pointer_axis, key_modifier);
4614  }
4615  else if(button_code == 6 || button_code == 7)
4616  {
4617  PointerAxis pointer_axis =
4618  { .time = event->time
4619  , .steps = button_code == 6 ? -1 : 1
4620  , .distance = button_code == 6 ? -15.0f : 15.0f
4621  , .source = PointerAxisSource::Wheel
4622  , .type = PointerAxisType::Horizontal
4623  };
4624 
4625  window_on_axis_map[window_id](pointer_axis, key_modifier);
4626  }
4627  }
4628 }

4672 void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_configure_notify_event_t* event
4673  ) noexcept
4674 {
4675 //std::cout << "Configue Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4676  if((event->response_type & 0x80) == 0)
4677  {
4678  // Only care about events with the "synthetic bit" set
4679  return;
4680  }
4681 
4682  const WindowId window_id = event->window;
4683 
4684  auto iter = window_size_map.find(window_id);
4685 
4686  if(iter == std::end(window_size_map))
4687  {
4688  return;
4689  }
4690 
4691  Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = iter->second;
4692 
4693  OutputId output_id;
4694  const Output& output = this->output(event->x, event->y, output_id);
4695 
4696  if(window_output_map[window_id] != output_id)
4697  {
4698  window_output_map[window_id] = output_id;
4699 
4700  windowResizeTo(output, window_size, event);
4701 
4702  return;
4703  }
4704 
4705  if(window_size.pixel.width == event->width
4706  && window_size.pixel.height == event->height
4707  )
4708  {
4709  return;
4710  }
4711 
4712  window_size.pixel = {event->width, event->height};
4713 
4714  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4715  , window_size.pixel.width
4716  , window_size.pixel.height
4717  );
4718  window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4719 
4720  auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4721  , window_size.pixel.width
4722  , window_size.pixel.height
4723  );
4724  window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4725 
4726  window_size.pixel_lambda(window_size.pixel);
4727  window_size.percent_lambda(window_size.percent);
4728  window_size.mm_lambda(window_size.mm);
4729 }

4830 
4858 void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_key_press_event_t* event
4859  ) noexcept
4860 {
4861 //std::cout << "Key Press: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4862 
4863  uint32_t key_code = (uint32_t)event->detail - 8;
4864 
4865  constexpr uint16_t CapsLock = 0b0000'0010'0000'0000;
4866  constexpr uint16_t NumLock = 0b0000'0001'0000'0000;
4867  constexpr uint16_t Alt_Left = 0b0000'0000'1000'0000;
4868  constexpr uint16_t Alt_Right = 0b0000'0000'0100'0000;
4869  constexpr uint16_t Control_Left = 0b0000'0000'0010'0000;
4870  constexpr uint16_t Control_Right = 0b0000'0000'0001'0000;
4871  constexpr uint16_t Meta_Left = 0b0000'0000'0000'1000;
4872  constexpr uint16_t Meta_Right = 0b0000'0000'0000'0100;
4873  constexpr uint16_t Shift_Left = 0b0000'0000'0000'0010;
4874  constexpr uint16_t Shift_Right = 0b0000'0000'0000'0001;
4875 
4876  if(event->response_type == XCB_KEY_PRESS)
4877  {
4878  switch(key_code)
4879  {
4880  case KEY_CAPSLOCK:
4881  xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4882  xkb_modifier_pressed |= CapsLock;
4883  break;
4884 
4885  case KEY_NUMLOCK:
4886  xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4887  xkb_modifier_pressed |= NumLock;
4888  break;
4889 
4890  case KEY_LEFTALT:
4891  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Alt_Left;
4892  break;
4893 
4894  case KEY_RIGHTALT:
4895  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Alt_Right;
4896  break;
4897 
4898  case KEY_LEFTCTRL:
4899  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Control_Left;
4900  break;
4901 
4902  case KEY_RIGHTCTRL:
4903  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Control_Right;
4904  break;
4905 
4906  case KEY_LEFTMETA:
4907  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Meta_Left;
4908  break;
4909 
4910  case KEY_RIGHTMETA:
4911  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Meta_Right;
4912  break;
4913 
4914  case KEY_LEFTSHIFT:
4915  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Shift_Left;
4916  break;
4917 
4918  case KEY_RIGHTSHIFT:
4919  xkb_modifier_pressed |= Shift_Right;
4920  break;
4921  }
4922  }
4923  else
4924  {
4925  switch(key_code)
4926  {
4927  case KEY_CAPSLOCK:
4928  xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4929  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~CapsLock);
4930  break;
4931 
4932  case KEY_NUMLOCK:
4933  xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4934  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~NumLock);
4935  break;
4936 
4937  case KEY_LEFTALT:
4938  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Alt_Left);
4939  break;
4940 
4941  case KEY_RIGHTALT:
4942  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Alt_Right);
4943  break;
4944 
4945  case KEY_LEFTCTRL:
4946  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Control_Left);
4947  break;
4948 
4949  case KEY_RIGHTCTRL:
4950  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Control_Right);
4951  break;
4952 
4953  case KEY_LEFTMETA:
4954  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Meta_Left);
4955  break;
4956 
4957  case KEY_RIGHTMETA:
4958  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Meta_Right);
4959  break;
4960 
4961  case KEY_LEFTSHIFT:
4962  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Shift_Left);
4963  break;
4964 
4965  case KEY_RIGHTSHIFT:
4966  xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Shift_Right);
4967  break;
4968  }
4969  }
4970 
4971  key_modifier.pressed = 0;
4972 
4973  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & CapsLock)
4974  {
4975  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_CapsLock;
4976  }
4977 
4978  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & NumLock)
4979  {
4980  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_NumLock;
4981  }
4982 
4983  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Alt_Left | Alt_Right))
4984  {
4985  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Alt;
4986  }
4987 
4988  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Control_Left | Control_Right))
4989  {
4990  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Control;
4991  }
4992 
4993  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Meta_Left | Meta_Right))
4994  {
4995  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Meta;
4996  }
4997 
4998  if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Shift_Left | Shift_Right))
4999  {
5000  key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Shift;
5001  }
5002 
5003  const WindowId window_id = event->event;
5004 
5005  key_data_array[key_code].window_id = window_id;
5006 
5007  Key& key = key_data_array[key_code].key;
5008  key.code = key_code;
5009 
5010  if(event->response_type == XCB_KEY_PRESS)
5011  {
5012  key_data_array[key_code].modifier = key_modifier;
5013 
5014  if(key.time == event->time)
5015  {
5016  key.state = KeyState::Repeat;
5017  }
5018  else
5019  {
5020  key.time = event->time;
5021  key.state = KeyState::Pressed;
5022 
5023  key_data_array[key_code].repeat_time =
5024  event->time + xkb_controls.repeat_delay_ms
5025  ;
5026 
5027  window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_modifier);
5028  }
5029  }
5030  /* If another window is active and a key is pressed then the cursor is
5031  * moved into a Xenium window while the key remains pressed, it is
5032  * possible for the first key event to be recieved is the
5033  * XCB_KEY_RELEASE. This event must be ignored because there was no
5034  * precedding XCB_KEY_PRESS event. To identify the bad XCB_KEY_RELEASE
5035  * event from the good event, the key.time value will be `0` if the the
5036  * pressed event is missing. A non-`0` key.time value means there was
5037  * a preceding XCB_KEY_PRESS event.
5038  */
5039  else if(key.time != 0) // && (event->response_type == XCB_KEY_RELEASE)
5040  {
5041  key.time = event->time;
5042  key.state = KeyState::Released;
5043 
5044  key_data_array[key_code].modifier = key_modifier;
5045  }
5046 }

5096 void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_property_notify_event_t* event
5097  ) noexcept
5098 {
5099 //std::cout << "Property Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
5100 
5101  xcb_generic_error_t generic_error = {0};
5102 
5103  if(event->atom == atom_net_frame_extents)
5104  {
5105  std::vector<int32_t> atom_data = Xenium::atomValueData(event->window
5106  , atom_net_frame_extents
5107  , XCB_ATOM_CARDINAL
5108  , 4
5109  , generic_error
5110  );
5111 
5112  struct
5113  {
5114  int32_t left;
5115  int32_t right;
5116  int32_t top;
5117  int32_t bottom;
5118  }
5119  frame_extents =
5120  { .left = atom_data[0]
5121  , .right = atom_data[1]
5122  , .top = atom_data[2]
5123  , .bottom = atom_data[3]
5124  };
5125 
5126  WindowDecorationsData& window = window_decorations_map[event->window];
5127 
5128  WindowDecorations window_decorations = window.window_decorations;
5129 
5130  if(frame_extents.left == 0
5131  && frame_extents.right == 0
5132  && frame_extents.top == 0
5133  && frame_extents.bottom == 0
5134  )
5135  {
5136  window.window_decorations = WindowDecorations::Client_Side;
5137  }
5138  else
5139  {
5140  window.window_decorations = WindowDecorations::Server_Side;
5141  }
5142 
5143  if(window.window_decorations != window_decorations)
5144  {
5145  window.lambda(window.window_decorations);
5146  }
5147 
5148  return;
5149  }
5150 
5151  if(event->atom == atom_net_wm_state)
5152  {
5153  std::vector<xcb_atom_t> value =
5154  atomValueAtom(event->window, event->atom, generic_error);
5155 
5156  WindowMode new_window_mode = WindowMode::Normal;
5157 
5158  if(zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz)
5159  && zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert)
5160  )
5161  {
5162  new_window_mode = WindowMode::Maximized;
5163  }
5164  else if(zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen))
5165  {
5166  new_window_mode = WindowMode::Fullscreen;
5167  }
5168 
5169  if(window_mode_map.contains(event->window))
5170  {
5171  WindowModeData& data = window_mode_map[event->window];
5172  LambdaWindowMode lambda = LambdaWindowMode_DoNothing;
5173  if(data.window_mode != new_window_mode)
5174  {
5175  data.window_mode = new_window_mode;
5176  lambda = data.lambda;
5177  }
5178 
5179  lambda(new_window_mode);
5180  }
5181 
5182  return;
5183  }
5184 }

5270 std::error_code Xenium::xcbWindowCreateValidate(Xenium::WindowCreateData* window_data
5271  ) noexcept
5272 {
5273  window_data->output_id = output_map.begin()->first;
5274  Xenium::Output& output = output_map.begin()->second;
5275 
5276  Xenium::SizePixel size_pixel;
5277 
5278  if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
5279  {
5280  auto pixel = convertMmToPixel(output
5281  , window_data->size_mm.width
5282  , window_data->size_mm.height
5283  );
5284  size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
5285  }
5286  else if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Percent)
5287  {
5288  auto pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
5289  , window_data->size_percent.width
5290  , window_data->size_percent.height
5291  );
5292  size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
5293  }
5294  else // if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Pixel)
5295  {
5296  size_pixel = window_data->size_pixel;
5297  }
5298 
5299  if((size_pixel.width < Window_Size_Minimum)
5300  || (size_pixel.width < Window_Size_Minimum)
5301  )
5302  {
5303  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
5304  }
5305 
5306  if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
5307  {
5308  window_data->size_pixel = size_pixel;
5309 
5310  auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
5311  , window_data->size_pixel.width
5312  , window_data->size_pixel.height
5313  );
5314  window_data->size_percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
5315  }
5316  else if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Percent)
5317  {
5318  window_data->size_pixel = size_pixel;
5319 
5320  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
5321  , window_data->size_pixel.width
5322  , window_data->size_pixel.height
5323  );
5324  window_data->size_mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
5325  }
5326  else // if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Pixel)
5327  {
5328  auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
5329  , window_data->size_pixel.width
5330  , window_data->size_pixel.height
5331  );
5332  window_data->size_mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
5333 
5334  auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
5335  , window_data->size_pixel.width
5336  , window_data->size_pixel.height
5337  );
5338  window_data->size_percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
5339  }
5340 
5341  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
5342 }

5352 std::error_code Xenium::xcbWindowCreateClient(Xenium::WindowCreateData* data
5353  ) noexcept
5354 {

5356

5358  xcb_create_window_aux_checked(this->connection
5359  , this->screen->root_depth // depth
5360  , data->window_id // requested id
5361  , this->screen->root // parent window id
5362  , 0, 0 // location x,y
5363  , data->size_pixel.width // width
5364  , data->size_pixel.height // height
5365  , 0 // border width
5366  , XCB_WINDOW_CLASS_INPUT_OUTPUT // "class"
5367  , this->screen->root_visual // visual
5368  , data->value_mask
5369  , &data->value_list
5370  );

5373

5377

5379 
5380  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5381  }
5382 
5383  data->atom_close_request = atomCreateDeleteWindow(data->window_id
5384  , generic_error
5385  );
5386

5390

5392  }

5395  xcb_change_property_checked(this->connection
5396  , XCB_PROP_MODE_REPLACE

5400  , 32 // 32-bit values
5401  , 18 // 18 values
5402  , &size_hints
5403  );
5404 
5405  if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
5406  {
5407  ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
5408 
5409  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5410  }
5411 
5412  data->gc = xcb_generate_id(this->connection);
5413  cookie = xcb_create_gc_checked(this->connection
5414  , data->gc
5415  , data->window_id
5416  , 0
5417  , nullptr
5418  );
5419 
5420  if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
5421  {

5423 
5424  data->gc = 0;
5425

5561 std::error_code Xenium::atomInit() noexcept
5562 {
5563  auto cookie_motif_wm_hints = internAtomRequest("_MOTIF_WM_HINTS");
5564  auto cookie_net_frame_extents = internAtomRequest("_NET_FRAME_EXTENTS");
5565  auto cookie_net_wm_state = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE");
5566  auto cookie_net_wm_state_fullscreen = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN");
5567  auto cookie_net_wm_state_hidden = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_HIDDEN");
5568  auto cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_horz = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ");
5569  auto cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_vert = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT");
5570  auto cookie_wm_change_state = internAtomRequest("WM_CHANGE_STATE");
5571  auto cookie_wm_delete_window = internAtomRequest("WM_DELETE_WINDOW");
5572  auto cookie_wm_protocols = internAtomRequest("WM_PROTOCOLS");
5573 
5574  xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
5575 
5576  atom_motif_wm_hints = internAtomReply(cookie_motif_wm_hints , generic_error);
5577  atom_net_frame_extents = internAtomReply(cookie_net_frame_extents , generic_error);
5578  atom_net_wm_state = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state , generic_error);
5579  atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_fullscreen , generic_error);
5580  atom_net_wm_state_hidden = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_hidden , generic_error);
5581  atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_horz , generic_error);
5582  atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_vert , generic_error);
5583  atom_wm_change_state = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_change_state , generic_error);
5584  atom_wm_delete_window = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_delete_window , generic_error);
5585  atom_wm_protocols = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_protocols , generic_error);
5586 
5587  if(atom_wm_delete_window == XCB_ATOM_NONE)

6041 
6045 void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_crtc_change_t* event
6046  ) noexcept
6047 {
6048 //std::cout << "RandR CRTC Chang:" << *event << '\n';
6049  OutputId output_id = event->crtc;
6050 
6051  if(this->screen->root != event->window
6052  || output_map.contains(output_id) == false
6053  )
6054  {
6055  return;
6056  }
6057 
6058  Output& output = output_map[output_id];
6059 
6060  if(output.x == event->x
6061  && output.y == event->y
6062  && output.width == event->width
6063  && output.height == event->height
6064  && output.transform == event->rotation
6065  )
6066  {
6067  return;
6068  }
6069 
6070  output.x = event->x;
6071  output.y = event->y;
6072  output.width = event->width;
6073  output.height = event->height;
6074  output.transform = event->rotation;
6075 
6076  output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal = (float)event->width / output.physical_width_mm;
6077  output.pixels_per_mm_vertical = (float)event->height / output.physical_height_mm;
6078 
6079  output_on_change(output_id);
6080 }
6081 
6082 
6086 void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_output_change_t* event
6087  ) noexcept
6088 {
6089 //std::cout << "RandR Output Chg:" << *event << '\n';
6090 
6091  if(this->screen->root != event->window)
6092  {
6093  return;
6094  }
6095 
6096  OutputId output_id = event->crtc;
6097 
6098  if(event->connection == XCB_RANDR_CONNECTION_DISCONNECTED)
6099  {
6100  if(output_map.contains(output_id))
6101  {
6102  output_on_remove(output_id);
6103  }
6104 
6105  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
6106 
6107  output_map.erase(output_id);
6108  }
6109  else if((event->connection == XCB_RANDR_CONNECTION_CONNECTED)
6110  || (output_map.contains(output_id) == false)
6111  )
6112  {
6113  std::error_code error;
6114  {
6115  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
6116 
6117  error = outputAdd(event->crtc, event->output);
6118  }
6119 
6120  if(!error)
6121  {
6122  output_on_add(output_id);
6123  }
6124  }
6125  else
6126  {
6127  Output& output = output_map[output_id];
6128 
6129  if(output.subpixel != event->subpixel_order
6130  || output.transform != event->rotation
6131  )
6132  {
6133  output.subpixel = event->subpixel_order;
6134  output.transform = event->rotation;
6135 
6136  output_on_change(output_id);
6137  }
6138  }
6139 }

6148 void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_notify_event_t* event
6149  ) noexcept
6150 {
6151  switch(event->subCode)
6152  {
6153  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_CRTC_CHANGE:
6154  randrEvent(&event->u.cc);
6155  break;
6156  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_OUTPUT_CHANGE:
6157  randrEvent(&event->u.oc);
6158  break;
6159  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_OUTPUT_PROPERTY:
6160  // Not Used
6161  break;
6162  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_PROVIDER_CHANGE:
6163  // Not Used
6164  break;
6165  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_PROVIDER_PROPERTY:
6166  // Not Used
6167  break;
6168  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_RESOURCE_CHANGE:
6169  // Not Used
6170  break;
6171  case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_LEASE:
6172  // Not Used
6173  break;
6174  default:
6175  fprintf(stderr, "Unhandled Sub-Event %d\n", event->subCode);
6176  }
6177 }

6225 void Xenium::keyDataArrayClear() noexcept
6226 {
6227  const auto time_now = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
6228 
6229  for(auto& key_data : key_data_array)
6230  {
6231  Key& key = key_data.key;
6232 
6233  if(key.time == 0)
6234  {
6235  continue;
6236  }
6237 
6238  key.state = KeyState::Released;
6239  key.time = time_now;
6240 
6241  const KeyModifier& modifier = key_data.modifier;
6242  const WindowId& window_id = key_data.window_id;
6243 
6244  window_on_key_map[window_id](key, modifier);
6245 
6246  key.time = 0;
6247  }
6248 }
6249 
6250 
6259 void Xenium::keyDataArrayProcess() noexcept
6260 {
6261  for(auto& key_data : key_data_array)
6262  {
6263  Key& key = key_data.key;
6264 
6265  if(key.time == 0)
6266  {
6267  continue;
6268  }
6269 
6270  if(key.state == KeyState::Pressed)
6271  {
6272  key.state = KeyState::Repeat;
6273 
6274  continue;
6275  }
6276 
6277  const WindowId& window_id = key_data.window_id;
6278 
6279  if(key.state == KeyState::Released)
6280  {
6281  window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_data.modifier);
6282  key.time = 0;
6283 
6284  continue;
6285  }
6286 
6287  auto& repeat_time = key_data.repeat_time;
6288 
6289  const auto time_now = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
6290 
6291  if(key.state == KeyState::Repeat
6292  && repeat_time < time_now
6293  )
6294  {
6295  window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_modifier);
6296  key.time = repeat_time;
6297  repeat_time += xkb_controls.repeat_interval_ms;
6298 
6299  continue;
6300  }
6301  }
6302 }

6333 void Xenium::xkbIndicatorStateUpdate() noexcept
6334 {
6335  xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state_reply_t* reply =
6336  xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state_reply(this->connection
6337  , xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state(this->connection
6338  , XCB_XKB_ID_USE_CORE_KBD
6339  )
6340  , nullptr

6351 
6352  key_modifier.locked = 0
6353  | (bool(state & XCB_XKB_INDICATOR_STATE_CAPSLOCK) * caps_lock)
6354  | (bool(state & XCB_XKB_INDICATOR_STATE_NUMLOCK) * num_lock)
6355  ;

6732 std::error_code Xenium::Window::sizeSet(const Xenium::SizeMm& size
6733  ) noexcept
6734 {
6735  std::lock_guard lock(xenium->output_mutex);
6736 
6737  Output& output = xenium->output_map[xenium->window_output_map[window_id]];
6738 
6739  Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id];
6740  window_size.unit = SizeUnit::Millimeter;
6741 
6742  auto pixel = xenium->convertMmToPixel(output
6743  , size.width
6744  , size.height
6745  );
6746 
6747  if(pixel.first < Window_Size_Minimum
6748  || pixel.second < Window_Size_Minimum
6749  )
6750  {
6751  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
6752  }
6753 
6754  if(pixel.first == window_size.pixel.width
6755  && pixel.second == window_size.pixel.height
6756  )
6757  {
6758  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
6759  }
6760 
6761  SizePixel size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
6762 
6763  std::error_code error = xenium->windowSizeSet(window_id, size_pixel);
6764 
6765  return error;
6766 }

7739 std::error_code Xenium::Window::imageNext(uint8_t*& image
7740  , Xenium::SizePixel& size
7741  ) noexcept
7742 {
7743  if(frame_buffer)
7744  {
7745  free(frame_buffer);
7746  }
7747 
7748  frame_buffer_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id].pixel;
7749  frame_buffer_length = frame_buffer_size.width * frame_buffer_size.height * 4;
7750  frame_buffer = (uint8_t*)malloc(sizeof(uint8_t) * frame_buffer_length);
7751 
7752  image = frame_buffer;
7753  size = frame_buffer_size;
7754 
7755  return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
7756 }
7757 
7758 
7765 void Xenium::Window::imagePresent() noexcept
7766 {
7767  /*
7768  Xenium::SizePixel size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id].pixel;
7769  if(size.width != frame_buffer_size.width
7770  || size.height != frame_buffer_size.height
7771  )
7772  {
7773  return;
7774  }
7775  */
7776 
7777  xcb_put_image(xenium->connection
7778  , XCB_IMAGE_FORMAT_Z_PIXMAP
7779  , window_id
7780  , gc
7781  , frame_buffer_size.width
7782  , frame_buffer_size.height
7783  , 0
7784  , 0
7785  , 0
7786  , xenium->screen->root_depth
7787  , frame_buffer_length
7788  , frame_buffer
7789  );
7790 
7791  frame_time = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
7792 }
7793 
7794 
7806 uint32_t Xenium::Window::time() const noexcept
7807 {
7808  return frame_time;
7809 }

8400  {
8401  s += "[";
8402  std::string delim = "";
8403 
8404  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Shift)
8405  {
8406  s += delim + "\"Shift\"";
8407  delim = ",";
8408  }
8409 
8410  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_CapsLock)
8411  {
8412  s += delim + "\"CapsLock\"";
8413  delim = ",";
8414  }
8415 
8416  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Control)
8417  {
8418  s += delim + "\"Control\"";
8419  delim = ",";
8420  }
8421 
8422  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Alt)
8423  {
8424  s += delim + "\"Alt\"";
8425  delim = ",";
8426  }
8427 
8428  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Meta)
8429  {
8430  s += delim + "\"Meta\"";
8431  }
8432 
8433  if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_NumLock)
8434  {
8435  s += delim + "\"NumLock\"";
8436  }
8437 
8438  s += "]";
8439  };
8440 
8441  std::string str = "{ \"pressed\": ";
8442  mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.pressed);
8443 
8444  str += ", \"latched\": ";
8445  mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.latched);
8446 
8447  str += ", \"locked\": ";
8448  mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.locked);
8449 
8450  str += " }";
8451 
8452  return str;
8453 }
